text: Yevhen Valentinovich Malyshev (10 March 2002 â€“ 1 March 2022) was a Ukrainian biathlete and soldier. He was born in Kharkiv, Ukraine. He participated in the 2020 Winter Youth Olympics in Lausanne, Switzerland. Malyshev died on 1 March 2022 during the Battle of Kharkiv, defending his hometown during the Russian invasion of Ukraine, aged 19. ==References== Category:2002 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Military people killed in action Category:2022 Russian invasion of Ukraine Category:Ukrainian military people Category:Sportspeople from Kharkiv
title: Yevhen Malyshev
